alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 3:44AM AKST until March 11 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 35 mph with gusts of 60 to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Downtown Juneau and Douglas. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 9 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Damaging winds will blow around loose debris and may blow down trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Taku winds will increase through Friday morning. Marmion Island at the southern tip of Douglas Island has already measured peak gusts in excess of 80 mph.
info.instruction: A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.
